mapper.insert:
insert into igams_nyysxx(sjid,xh,jclx,sjnyxid,json,llh,bbh) values
(#{item.sjid},cast(#{item.xh} as numeric),#{item.jclx},#{item.sjnyxid},cast(#{item.json} as json),#{item.llh},#{item.bbh})
mapper.select:
select sjid,xh,jclx,bbh ,json ->> '突变基因' AS tbjy,json ->> '突变结果' AS tbjg,json ->> '耐药性' AS nyx,json ->> '突变深度' AS tbsd,json ->> '突变频率' AS tbpl ,json ->> '背景突变' AS bjtb,json ->> 'ID' AS wkbh from igams_nyysxx nyx
sjid=#{sjid} and jclx=#{jclx} and llh=#{llh}
